review: I purchased the Fire TV stick for the sole purpose of using it for a Sling TV subscription (not yet supported by Apple TV). I wish I had paid more attention to the negative reviews, especially where Sling TV is concerned. The Fire TV stick simply cannot stream quickly enough - regardless of internet speed. As such, all apps (not just Sling) buffer horribly every few minutes. I've never seen anything like this before, and I sincerely hope Amazon fixes these issues for the next release - or trashes the concept altogether.

review: It worked great for a day. Now I can't do anything on it except for watch amazon prime. I spent hours tinkering with it and I contacted customer support. No help thus far. I'd give it 5 stars if my unit worked. I got one day out of it and it just quit downloading my apps. No Netflix, no YouTube, no nothing. I am very disappointed with this unit. If I get a replacement that works, I would give it a 5 star. Either these are crap units or I was just unlucky with mine. I'm not happy with this purchase.
